description: Headers are passed to the command line directly, without being wrapped in quotes. This causes the curl command to fail, causing images to not download.
title: Headers in virt/images.py function _fetch_s3_image are sent improperly to curl

comments.content: Headers are passed to the command line directly, without being wrapped in quotes. This causes the curl command to fail, causing images to not download.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane

comments.content: Setting to 'Fix Committed' since the branch linked here has been merged.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0
